Label.en: There’s also a plaque dedicated to the 147 rebels who were shot by the government in 1871 when the Commune was crushed
Label.fr: Il y a aussi une plaque dédiée aux 147 rebelles fusillés lors de la répression de l'insurrection de la Commune en 1871
Label.es: There’s also a plaque dedicated to the 147 rebels who were shot by the government in 1871 when the Commune was crushed
Label.zh: There’s also a plaque dedicated to the 147 rebels who were shot by the government in 1871 when the Commune was crushed

Label.en: That story is too long to tell here...
Label.fr: Cette histoire est trop longue pour être racontée ici... mais elle s'est achevée de triste façon au Père Lachaise
Label.es: That story is too long to tell here...
Label.zh: That story is too long to tell here...

Label.en: But as a result, the graveyard remains a popular meeting point for anarchists and socialists to this day!
Label.fr: Le cimetière demeure de ce fait un point de rencontre populaire chez les anarchistes et les socialistes !
Label.es: But as a result, the graveyard remains a popular meeting point for anarchists and socialists to this day!
Label.zh: But as a result, the graveyard remains a popular meeting point for anarchists and socialists to this day!

Label.en: It's a lovely place... please check it out!
Label.fr: C'est un endroit merveilleux... fais-y un tour !
Label.es: It's a lovely place... please check it out!
Label.zh: It's a lovely place... please check it out!

Label.en: No... don't! It's a lovely place... please check it out!
Label.fr: Surtout pas... c'est un endroit merveilleux... fais-y un tour !
Label.es: No... don't! It's a lovely place... please check it out!
Label.zh: No... don't! It's a lovely place... please check it out!
